experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
Architected and deployed scalable microservices using FastAPI and Python, powering fraud detection systems processing 10K+ transactions per second with 99.9% uptime and real-time validation accuracy improvements.
Integrated Kafka with PostgreSQL to build asynchronous event pipelines, ensuring eventual consistency and improving distributed transaction reliability by 35% across core financial data systems.
Deployed containerized applications through Docker and Kubernetes (EKS), cutting deployment cycles by 40% and achieving consistent rollouts via automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions.
Implemented Redis-based caching layers to accelerate API responsiveness during peak loads, lowering average response latency by 30% and increasing throughput under high-concurrency financial workloads.
Partnered with security and compliance teams to enforce OAuth 2.0 and RBAC authentication, reducing unauthorized access by 35% and achieving full alignment with Company's internal governance standards.
Engineered RESTful APIs for cross-departmental analytics integration, embedding schema validation and audit logging to enhance data traceability and streamline compliance reporting across five enterprise divisions.
Designed PyTest-based automated testing frameworks, boosting test coverage to 90% and reducing post-deployment bugs by 45% during continuous production releases.
Collaborated with product managers and data scientists to refine fraud detection pipelines, improving model recall by 12% while maintaining sub-second inference latency and optimized MLOps execution.

Conducted peer code reviews using SonarQube and Checkstyle, reducing production defects by 30% while reinforcing consistent code quality and maintainability across distributed engineering teams.
